page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
The writers involved in this block who are{Kevin Allan,Michael Allan,Stephen {Byrne,Marcus Luke}and{Shane Lewington would like to acknowledge the help and support of the following people:- { {The Dearness Family of Scar. {Mr.and Mrs.J.Stout and Lassie of {Arion. {Messrs.D.D.and W.Towrie of Clickimin. {The Dearness Family of Knowe. {Mr.J.O.Alexander. {All at Hyndgreenie. {Mr.W.Dearness of Whistlebrae. {Mr.K.Luke of West Thrave. {Mr.R.H.F.Thorne.
We would also like to thank anyone else who was involved in the N.Burness project. {Thankyou.
